name: Magic Man: Trash Boogaloo
description:
Any donations will be directed towards the #TeamSeas organization

---

How To Play:

Movement: WASD or Arrow Keys

Shoot: Mouse0

Interact: E

Every room you enter will close and enemies will appear. Upon finishing the enemies a chest will appear. Opening and collecting the items of that chest will then trigger the doors to open, allowing you to explore further into the dungeon.

---

Hey this is Magic Man: Trash Boogaloo. It's the first ever game I've actually followed most of the way through on (it's honestly half-baked, and half-fun). But, I definitely had fun making it.

Is it fun? Probably not, it's honestly less playable than most of these submissions.

What can I expect? Trash, a magic wand, Danny Devito, and Dani's Milkers inside a quaint chest.

What's the objective? Delve into the grotto, clean up as much trash and corrupted slimey boiz as you can. Use items  such as Danny Devito, or Finn's sword to aid you in your journey.

Anyways, here's the book summary of the game: Magic Man: Trash Boogaloo is a rogue-like dungeon game that takes place in underwater grotto. In this maze-like dungeon that seems to be awfully half-arsed, you'll find that someone has dumped there trash there. Residue is escaping into the ocean above, and corrupting the fauna below, fix it.
